languages.text: "Я давно был лишен роскоши свободно излагать свои мысли. Я лишь цитирую план Теодоры".
"I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."
languages.original_text: "Я давно был лишен роскоши свободно излагать свои мысли. Я лишь цитирую план Теодоры".

traits.locale_text: "I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."
"I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."
"I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."
"I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."
"I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."
"I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."

languages.text: «Hace mucho que me arrebataron el lujo de expresar libremente mis opiniones. Solo estoy citando el plan de Theodora».
languages.original_text: "I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."

traits.locale_text: «Hace mucho que me arrebataron el lujo de expresar libremente mis opiniones. Solo estoy citando el plan de Theodora».

languages.text: “我从很久以前就被剥夺了自由表达想法的权利，我仅仅是在阐述西奥多拉的计划。”
languages.original_text: "I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."

traits.locale_text: “我从很久以前就被剥夺了自由表达想法的权利，我仅仅是在阐述西奥多拉的计划。”

languages.text: 「私はとっくに、自分の考えを自由に表現する贅沢を奪われていた。ただ単にシオドーラの計画を引用しているに過ぎない」
languages.original_text: "I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."

traits.locale_text: 「私はとっくに、自分の考えを自由に表現する贅沢を奪われていた。ただ単にシオドーラの計画を引用しているに過ぎない」

languages.text: "Der Luxus, meine Gedanken frei äußern zu können, wurde mir vor langer Zeit geraubt. Ich zitiere lediglich Theodoras Plan."
languages.original_text: "I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."

traits.locale_text: "Der Luxus, meine Gedanken frei äußern zu können, wurde mir vor langer Zeit geraubt. Ich zitiere lediglich Theodoras Plan."

languages.text: « Cela fait bien longtemps que l'on m'a privé du luxe d'exprimer mes pensées. Je ne fais que reprendre à mon compte le plan de Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."

traits.locale_text: « Cela fait bien longtemps que l'on m'a privé du luxe d'exprimer mes pensées. Je ne fais que reprendre à mon compte le plan de Théodora. »

languages.text: "Uzun zaman önce düşüncelerimi özgürce ifade etme lüksünden mahrum bırakıldım. Yalnızca Theodora'nın planını aktarıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I have long since been robbed of the luxury of freely expressing my thoughts. I am merely quoting Theodora's plan."

traits.locale_text: "Uzun zaman önce düşüncelerimi özgürce ifade etme lüksünden mahrum bırakıldım. Yalnızca Theodora'nın planını aktarıyorum."
